name: BREAK IT (DREAM ZER0)
description:
PLAYER VS PLAYER

Players will face each other in a battle throwing things at each other. Players began fighting with one another by tossing various items over the fence until timeout. Your task is to hit the opponent with objects around the map, Each object has diffirent special effect.

You can choose 3 diffrent level to play with your friend

- Town

- School

- Office

Control

W A S D - Move Player 1

Arrow Up Down Left Right - Move Player 2

Space Bar - Player 1 Throw

Enter  - Player 2 Throw

This game made in 48 hours during game jam event.

Enjoy!
